data.title: Horse Shoe Media
data.text:
Based in India, Horse Shoe Media is a creative and production services company with a global vision and network. With expertise in unscripted and documentary programming, Horse Shoe Media develops and produces riveting content for streaming services, audio platforms, brands and television networks.

Founded in 2014, Horse Shoe Media is run by Raghav Khanna who has worked with Netflix, The National Geographic and Fox Networks. He comes with over 13 years of international experience in the media and entertainment industry.

We are a team of experienced yet young creative minds who strive to bring excellence and relevance in the content we develop.

Whether it is creating IP for a multi-season franchise, an access driven documentary or understanding your brand and building a bespoke narrative around it - we excel at developing content with editorial integrity and clarity while having the articulation and finesse of traditional storytelling.

We are developing a multi-genre bouquet of IPs and concepts suited for streaming and audio platforms.

A lot is often lost between vision and execution.

We bring on board production expertise with a thorough understanding of the entire studio operations and workflow pipelines from pre-production to post.

Whether you have developed a series in-house or have a vision for your brand - we partner with you to manage the execution of your ideas across creative, talent relations, financial, logistical and technical aspects of a production while bringing on board a team of experienced media professionals.

Having worked with global companies, clients and a diverse pool of talent, we understand various industry norms and workflows.

We provide efficient, transparent, safe and best-in-class line-production services for your incoming productions.

Whether it is a feature film, series, commercial or a documentary which you wish to produce in Asia, we partner with you for budgeting, location scouting, filming permissions, casting, crew hiring and ensuring legal compliance for your incoming production.
